source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_00<tab>Mogleo has found the next lucky recipient of his kindness.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_00<tab>Mogleo semble avoir trouvé un autre Mog à qui venir en aide.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_01<tab>The thoroughness of Mogleo's search for those in need surprises you once again, for he has somehow found another distressed moogle quite far from any established settlement. Mogleo looks eager to help, and it falls once again upon you to strike up conversation and find out what troubles this particular moogle.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_01<tab>Mogleo a trouvé un Mog manifestement chagriné par quelque chose. Demandez à ce Mog ce qui lui est arrivé.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_02<tab>The poor moogle at Zenith has perhaps the most heartbreaking story yet. It seems that dragons have overrun the flower bed he had been so dutifully caring over, and drove him away when he attempted to impart onto them the flowers' importance. Now, the moogle is trapped at Zenith with no way to return to Asah because the road is blocked by the selfsame dragons that invaded his flower bed. Mogleo, seeing an opportunity to help yet another desperate moogle, volunteers his protection while the heartbroken moogle makes his way home. Speak with Mogleo again, who wants to discuss the battle strategy of this next adventure with you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_02<tab>Le Mog larmoyant vous a raconté qu'il s'était fâché contre un dragon qui avait piétiné les fleurs qu'il était en train d'arroser, et que le monstre l'a poursuivi partout jusqu'à ce qu'il se réfugie à Zénith. Le Mog aimerait retourner au passe-nuage d'Asah, mais le dragon le guette en rôdant sur le chemin qui y mène. Mogleo a alors offert de l'escorter, mais il souhaite s'entretenir avec vous avant de partir. Écoutez ce qu'il a à vous dire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_03<tab>Mogleo seems determined to take on this task alone, but also states that in the case of an actual dragon attack, your assistance would be more than welcome. Follow Mogleo and the troubled moogle as they make their way to Asah so that you may see Mogleo's courageous display of moogle strength.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_03<tab>Mogleo vous a annoncé qu'il voudrait essayer de remplir cette nouvelle mission seul, car il est bien conscient qu'il ne pourra pas toujours faire appel à votre aide. Il vous a cependant demandé de le suivre et de lui prêter main-forte si les choses tournaient mal. Rattrapez-le.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_04<tab>Much to the surprise of no one at all, you find Mogleo and his charge cowering in fear before an enraged dragon. Save the moogles before they become the dragon's next meal.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez rattrapé Mogleo qui s'est retrouvé en bien mauvaise posture face à un dragon à deux pas de Zénith. Portez-lui secours.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_05<tab>Mogleo and the worried moogle are grateful for your rescue, and promptly continue down the road to Asah. Follow them to make sure they do not fall prey to any more of the Churning Mists' hungry dragons.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez secouru Mogleo qui s'est im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment remis en route vers le passe-nuage d'Asah. Rattrapez-le pour vous assurer qu'il arrive à bon port.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_06<tab>Once again, you arrive to find the two moogles in a difficult situation involving dragons. Intervene before their journey to Asah is cut prematurely short.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez trouvé Mogleo à nouveau aux prises avec un dragon belliqueux. Sauvez-le des griffes du monstre.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_07<tab>After you rescue the two frightened moogles, Mogleo claims that he was close to felling the dragon himself before continuing on the path towards Asah. Whether or not his boasting is true, follow the moogles to guarantee their safe arrival.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez une fois de plus secouru Mogleo qui s'est alors précipité avec l'autre Mog vers le passe-nuage d'Asah. Allez lui parler.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_08<tab>The two moogles have arrived safely at Asah, but Mogleo is ashamed that he was not able to dispatch the dragons himself. However, with the encouragement of the moogle he guided to Asah, he resolves to continue helping moogles until he finds the courage to overcome his fear himself.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_SEQ_08<tab>Mogleo était dépité d'avoir cédé à la panique et de ne pas avoir réussi à se débrouiller seul. Cependant, après avoir reçu les encouragements du Mog qu'il a escorté tant bien que mal, il s'est juré de faire mieux la prochaine fois et s'est remis im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à la recherche d'un autre Mog à qui offrir ses services.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_000<tab>Look, adventurer, it's another moogle that needs our help. I wonder where his troubles will lead us, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_000<tab>J'ai trouvé un Mog qui a l'air tout chagriné. Demandons-lui ce qui ne va pas, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_017<tab>This moogle looks absolutely agitated, kupo! But...we won't be able to offer our aid until we find out what's wrong with him. Go ahead, adventurer, ask away!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_017<tab>Demandons à ce Mog ce qui le chagrine à ce point, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_010<tab>This won't do...this won't do at all, kupo... Oh, whatever shall I do...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_010<tab>C'est vraiment trop injuste, kuppo... C'est facile de s'en prendre aux plus petits que soi...
TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_011<tab>Qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>? Vous avez un problème, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_012<tab>Well... I came here from Asah because the flowers here bloom so lovely, and every day I've watered them without fail. But then those discourteous dragons came in and started stamping all over them, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_012<tab>Un de ces dragons mal élevés est venu piétiner de jolies petites fleurs que j'étais en train d'arroser sur le bord du chemin, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_013<tab>I could only stand their lack of manners for so long, until one day I gave them a stern lecture in hopes they would change their ways. But, dragons being dragons, they roared and gnashed their teeth and chased me from my beloved flower bed!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_013<tab>Je me suis fâché tout rouge, en lui disant que ce n'était pas des manières, mais il m'a rugi dessus et m'a poursuivi partout jusqu'à ce que je vienne me réfugier ici... Quel rustre, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_014<tab>I've no choice now but to go back to Asah, but the dragons are stalking the road home... All I wanted to do was take care of the flowers, and now I'm trapped here, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_014<tab>J'aimerais rentrer au passe-nuage d'Asah, mais ce dragon me guette en rôdant sur le chemin qui y mène. C'est trop injuste<var 1D /var>! Je n'ai pourtant rien fait de mal, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_015<tab>Hmmm, that's quite the quandary... Ah hah! All I have to do is protect you on the way home, kupo! Those dragons won't dare come near my mighty blade.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_015<tab>Hmm... Je vois. Bien<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas, je vais vous escorter, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Au fait, je me présente, je m'appelle Mogleo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_016<tab>Adventurer, come close. We must form our battle strategy, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_016<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, deux mots avant de partir, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_024<tab>I just wanted to water flowers, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_024<tab>Tout ce que je voulais, moi, c'était arroser de jolies petites fleurs. C'est trop injuste, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_020<tab>Adventurer, I know you've helped me in the past, but I must ask you to let me take care of this task myself.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_020<tab>Cette fois-ci, je vais essayer d'accomplir ma mission sans votre aide, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_021<tab>To be a member of the Pomguard not only requires a generous heart, but a strong arm as well. I shall guide this moogle safely home by virtue of my own blade, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_021<tab>Je ne pourrai pas toujours faire appel à vous. Il faut que je prouve que je suis capable de me débrouiller tout seul, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_022<tab>But...there <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> lots of dragons on the road to Asah, and if one were to happen to attack, you have my permission to come to our rescue! A moogle's no good to anyone if they become dragon fodder!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_022<tab>Enfin... je préfère tout de même que vous restiez dans les parages, kuppo. Et puis... n'hésitez pas à me prêter main-forte si nous nous faisons attaquer. Je tiens plus à la vie qu'à ma fierté, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_023<tab>Now that our strategy has been carefully thought through, it's time to set out. Follow close behind, adventurer, so that you may bask in the courage of mooglekind!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_023<tab>Bien<var 1D /var>! En route pour le passe-nuage d'Asah<var 1D /var>! Ce dragon n'a qu'à bien se tenir, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_030<tab>The dragon almost cornered us, kupo... But thanks to you, we've not suffered a scratch! Let's continue on our way to Asah!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_030<tab>Je-je-je... Je me suis laissé surprendre, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Merci pour le coup de main, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Reprenons la route pour le passe-nuage d'Asah, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_035<tab>Au secours<var 1D /var>! Il y a des dragons partout<var 1D /var>! J'ai peur, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_040<tab>I almost had him that time! Just a couple more swings of my sword and the dragon would've fallen before me. Only a little bit further to Asah. Come, adventurer!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_040<tab>J'avais la situation bien en main<var 1D /var>! Mais merci pour le coup de pouce<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes presque arrivés. Dépêchons-nous, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_100_040<tab>Finally I've returned to Asah. Thank you, kupo!

TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_050<tab>Despite some hardships, we've finally completed our journey. But...adventurer, I am ashamed I wasn't strong enough to protect this moogle on my own. When the dragons let out their terrifying roar, I couldn't do anything but cower in fear, kupo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_050<tab>En fin de compte, je n'ai pas réussi à me débrouiller tout seul... Je ne sais pas ce qui m'a pris. J'étais comme paralysé, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_051<tab>Fret not, Mogleo! If not for you by my side, I would've never been able to return to Asah. Your courage was truly inspiring, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_TROUBLEMOG03_000_051<tab>Allons, Mogleo, ne soyez pas si dépité<var 1D /var>! Vous avoir à mes côtés était très réconfortant<var 1D /var>! Et puis, nous sommes arrivés ici sains et saufs, après tout, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_052<tab>I...thank you for the encouragement, but the Pomguard would never take a moogle like me. The only course of action is to...help more moogles, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_052<tab>Oui, mais si ça continue comme ça, je n'arriverai jamais à me faire accepter dans la Garde-pompon<var 1D /var>! Bon, la prochaine fois, je vais donner tout ce que j'ai, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_053<tab>My courage shall not falter again! Now, I'm off to find another pom-pom in need of aid!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ413_01831_MOGLEO_000_053<tab>D'ailleurs, je m'en vais de ce pas chercher quelqu'un d'autre à aider, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
